name: FC - S - External Envelope
Details
Eco ply taped nailing checked
Supplied & installed by others
RAB board Fixing and spacings checked in accordance with manufacturers specs (Photos attached)
Fire strip installed (Photos attached)
Soffit checked and accurate (Photos attached)
Garage reveals checked and accurate (Photos attached)
DPC installed checked and accurate (Photos attached)
Request sign off
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman

FC - S - Windows, Sliders and Sealants
Template Name: FC - S - Windows, Sliders and Sealants

name: Details
Fixings and clearance around opening min 6mm & max 18mm and PEF rod/air seal are within acceptable tolerance level
Check taping around, before installing the windows and sliders
Packers to be correctly used and set back to allow continuous air seal
Jambs level and straight for finishing lines on the side
Door and window jambs flush to GIB Board
Check air seal is provided at the rear of the window reveal
All joints detailed as per attached Detail Document
All framing completed correctly within tolerance in respective area
Sill support fixing bars installed for all joinery within acceptable tolerance level
All windows, sliders and sealant installation completed to specification & within tolerance in respective area(s)
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
FC - S - Exterior Timber Framing
Details
Setout completed, checked & accurate (no clashes & wall locations clearly marked)
Framing Dimensions / locations checked & accurate
All frames have been installed square, straight and plumb
DPC installed (if required) correctly
Fixings are correct to specification including any seismic/bracing requirements (attach relevant photos)
All Nogs (Service/Specialty) & penetrations - installed, checked & correct (ensure acoustic & fire rating requirements)
All timber framing completed correctly to specification & within tolerance in respective area(s)
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
